page.title: 18Mousehole Harbour Sports
page.content: {Mousehole Harbour Sports}were first started in 1878, probably as a result of rivalry between the different families of the village as to who was the best at sailing, rowing, sculling or swimming. This developed to rivalry between the villages, but as the{fishing industry in{Mousehole}declined so did the {Harbour Sports}until it was suspended in 1953. However it only lay dormant to be restarted again in 1978 and has continued until today. It is believed to be one of the few sports of this type which are still held and in 1985 there were 34 events listed on the programme. A collection is made at the event and the proceeds are used so that it can continue as an annual event, any surplus money raised is used to support local{charities.
